CustomField.description: Tells you whether the Account is a Law Firm in the IntApp 600, outside the IntApp 600, other Professional Services firms, or Some Other Industry.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, "Legal"), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Legal_Entity_Type__c ,"Firm"), ISPICKVAL(Legal_Entity_Type__c ,"ABS") ), IF( Intapp_Master_Ranking__c >0, "Law Firm in 900", "Law Firm outside 900" ), "Legal Non-Firm" ), IF( BEGINS(TEXT(Industry), "PS"), "Professional Services Firm", IF( BEGINS(TEXT(Industry), "FS"), "Financial Services Firm", "Some Other Industry" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells you whether the Account is a Law Firm in the IntApp 600, outside the IntApp 600, other Professional Services firms, or Some Other Industry.
CustomField.label: Industry - Simple (Legacy)
